Others: Adem Bona played 17 minutes in his first real minutes in the NBA against the Cleveland Cavaliers, pulling down 9 rebounds and scoring 4 points.
Bona was thrown into the mix due to Joel Embiid managing his knee and Andre Drummond being a late scratch.
Nick Nurse praised Bona for not making many mistakes in his first game.
Bona credited his chance to get game reps in the G League for helping him be ready for his opportunity.
Bona and Jared McCain have developed a close relationship and go to chapel together before every game.
